questions.question: What was the name of the nuclear power plant that experienced a catastrophic meltdown in 1986, causing widespread environmental and human health problems?
In 1997, the world was captivated by the tragic death of Princess Diana. In which city did her fatal car crash occur?
In what year did the first successful cloning of a mammal, Dolly the sheep, occur, sparking ethical debates and scientific curiosity worldwide?
Which groundbreaking global event occurred on July 20, 1969, captivating audiences around the world?
incorrectAnswers: The fall of the Berlin Wall
The start of the Gulf War
The release of the first Apple computer

questions.question: Which international agreement was signed in 1997 to address climate change by reducing carbon dioxide emissions?
Who was the first President of Russia, elected in 1991 after the dissolution of the Soviet Union?
In 1979, which revolution led to the establishment of an Islamic Republic?
Who was released from prison in 1990 after 27 years, becoming a symbol of the fight against apartheid?
Which disease became a global health crisis in the 1980s, leading to widespread awareness campaigns?
What major political change occurred in Hong Kong in 1997?
Which war began in 1990 after one country invaded Kuwait?
What significant space event occurred in 1986?
Which country hosted the 2000 Summer Olympics?
What major currency was introduced for electronic transactions in 1999?
Which technology company faced an antitrust lawsuit in the late 1990s?
